text: @Here_Is_Dadri haven't. Tweeted many people about it. Writing a whole chapter on him in my book
Cant follow-why in #Dadri its the meat that seems to be investigated more than the murder. Who cares whether it was beef, chicken or mutton
They say if you eat Beef go to Pakistan. I say- anyonne silent on #Dadri murder should pack up & leave. This is not the India they belong to
What's the point of making a (rightful) pitch for India at the global high table at the UN if back home we revel in murderous hatred #Dadri
How can Sangeet Som, riots acccused,hold a big sabha in Dadri in CLEAR violation of 144 & make most  inflammatory speech? Where's UP police?
Needed. Gandhi-giri, not Dadri-giri.
On @WeThePeopleNDTV #DadriLynchMob - BJP MLA & riot accused Sangeet Som vows revenge for "cow Killers", Will & Should PM speak out on Dadri?
For days @RituRathaur calls me pimp/bimbo/communal for my comments on #Dadri. Now FIR against her by @UPGovt for incitement/lies/rumours
Most shameful -@RituRathaur been tweeting me abusive messages with unsourced (fake?)pix of 'stolen' carcass to spread more poison in #Dadri
Heartbreaking. Sartaj, IAF officer & Son of (murdered) Akhlaq tells me "Sare Jaahan Se Accha Hindustan Hamara. I appeal for harmony" #Dadri
Lets trend #SaluteSartaj for his grace &dignity. On We The People he appeals for harmony. Says Sara Jahaan Se accha Hindustan Hamara  #Dadri
@wallflower_ish ? the Sartaj in question is the son of the man who was murdred in dadri
"My appeal to the country, Pray for my brother Danish. pray that he makes it": Sartaj, son of Akhlaq to me #Dadri #SaluteSartaj
If I were Sartaj I would be filled with rage.To hear him say Saare Jahan Se Accha..made me want to bow in admiration #SaluteSartaj #Dadri

BJP ally and J& K CM Mufti Sayeed joins chorus of voices saying PM must speak on #Dadri "Sarkar ki baat unki zubaan par aani chahiye"
"I met Muslims from #Dadri today. They are scared & hurt. But they want all politicians to stay away" @naqvimukhtar interview
"I have no view on nation wide  beef ban or cow slaughter, if someone wants to bring it to parliament, let them" @naqvimukhtar on #Dadri
Question 1 to @NitishKumar: PM has spoken out on #Dadri, invoked the President & said we must follow Pranab's principles. Your comments?
Shiv Sena is Sad that the PM says Dadri Lynching is Sad. The mind boggles. With friends like these.....and dont forget, partner in govt!

So if it was Beef ( Mutton or Pork), what the hell does that change? Shameful rationalization of mob murder #Dadri
what's happening in Dadri is a diabolical defence of Murder. Beef is not the Meat of the matter, Murder is. Mob Lynching is
In Dadri SP government just as answerable as local BJP leaders & their inflammatory remarks. Why has panchayat been allowed despite 144?

He serves in the Air Force&  a man charged with murdering his father is draped in the tricolour. Dishonour to the Flag & Uniform both #Dadri
